metadata.title: CVE-2018-11416 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: jpegoptim.c in jpegoptim 1.4.5 (fixed in 1.4.6) has an invalid use of realloc() and free(), which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: jpegoptim package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
